articles.title: Peter Stangolis
articles.contents:
Peter Stangolis
          
          
          Home
          About
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Peter Stangolis
          
          
            
              Originally educated in Kinesiology and Health Sciences
              from York University working in the rehabilitation field
              for 15 years. Then discovered the wonderful world of
              online courses. I completed numerous online courses in
              data analytics and data science through Coursera, EDx,
              LinkedIn Learn and finally decided to complete the Data
              Science Certificate program at Sheridan College completely
              online, while also working full time.
              This page is a place to mark my progress with online
              courses, employment and other fun facts I care to share
              about me…
